description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget called `CheckoutPreviewScreen` which presents a checkout UI for a book purchase. It displays a summary of the selected book, including cover image, title, author, prices, and a dummy payment interface styled after Razorpay. The widget uses various external packages like `cached_network_image`, `flutter/material.dart`, and `intl`, and references internal data models and tokens for styling.

classes.name: CheckoutPreviewScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a preview of the checkout process for a book, including order summary and a simulated payment interface.

methods.name: formatPrice
methods.description: Formats an integer price in cents to an INR currency string, e.g., '₹ 299'.

methods.name: _methodChip
methods.description: Creates a UI chip widget for a payment method option, displaying an icon and label.
